name: Computer Crashers
description:
Hello! I'm Wuuush an aspiring game dev and, I hope you will enjoy my first game Computer Crashers! This is a simple game that will give you a blast for a few hours. 

Computer Crashers is a top-down shooter made in Unity. You will play as a little robot going throughout the computer to destroy viruses. A laid back and stress free shooter, I hope Computer Crashers will give you hours of gameplay! Go out and save your computer!

If you liked the game please consider supporting me by Paypal (inside the game) or the itch.io support button!
